text: Okay thank you for that info, that helps :)

Hey all, over the last couple of days, users have been randomly receiving error messages stating "There was a problem displaying this content. Try refreshing the page. If the problem continues, contact the app developer for support with this trace ID: [TRACE ID]", when trying to display our custom CRM extensions. The trace log output contains the error: "Unable to initialize extension".
Does anyone have any idea what could be causing this issue?
We did update our project platform versions to 2023.2 last week but everything tested fine and the issue is very difficult to reproduce on purpose.

Thanks
would it would be beneficial for anyone else to have some sort of google maps or mapbox component added?
use cases: store/location management, sales rep routes, etc
This is helpful, thank you for your feedback
Can somebody help me find the documentation for context.user? I know I can just log it to see it but trying to not do that every time I need it.
Here's the full context object docs, user is documented in there
Thanks! I couldn't find it using Google
<@U06333EE0DN> thanks for reporting. We are looking into this.
Hmm it doesn't seem like we have associated owner id of the user. Was looking to see if I could save myself 1 api call.

Hi, I need to integrate our cloud telephony app with HubSpot crm.  I have created the app and run the calling extension sdk in local and successfully installed the app in test account. If I am not wrong, the next step is to customize the sdk according to our integration needs, right? Are there any particular rules or guidelines or structures to follow ? orelse, can we modify it on our own ways? Can somebody help me with this?
